**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A large, stylized symbol of an eye adorns the top of this wooden staff, representing the watchful eye of the divine powers. The bearer of the staff can guide and protect, seeing bounties and tragedies that could befall them in the future. When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus on [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) or [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27), and to [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26). **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Providence **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)
  • **1st** [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [_create water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=53)
  • **2nd** [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15), [_create food_](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [_status_](/Spells.aspx?ID=308)
Staff of Providence (Greater) **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_safe passage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=712), [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368)
  • **4th** [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296), [_status_](/Spells.aspx?ID=308)
Staff of Providence (Major) **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 4,100 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296)
  • **6th** [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296), [_scintillating safeguard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=713), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)
Staff of Providence (True) **Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 264 2.0 **Price** 64,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **7th** [_energy aegis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=100), [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296)
  • **8th** [_divine inspiration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=83), [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296)
  • **9th** [_foresight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=127), [_overwhelming presence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=212), [_spell immunity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=296)
name: Staff of Providence (Greater)
